En cualquier caso, nos hemos perdido. ¿Eso que huelo es comida?
vi_translation: - We separated from the group. We work for the circus. Our uncle told us that if we got lost, we should come to this gas station, and he would wait for us. But he probably forgot, or he mentioned a different gas station, and we misunderstood. No matter what he said, we are lost now. Is that the smell of food?
tr_translation: "We got separated from our caravan," I said. "Our circus caravan. The circus manager had told us to wait at the gas station if we got lost, but either he forgot or he meant a different gas station. Anyway, we got lost. Is that the smell of food I'm sensing?"
es_translation: —We got separated from the caravan —I replied—. Our circus caravan. The ringmaster told us that we would meet at the gas station if we got lost, but he might have forgotten, or maybe he was referring to a different gas station. In any case, we are lost. Is that food I smell?

en: Very, very carefully, without looking down, she knelt and draped the monster’s head in black cloth, then picked it up. It was still dripping green juice.
vi: Cực kỳ cẩn trọng, mắt vẫn không nhìn xuống, nó gói đầu yêu quái bằng miếng vải đen rồi nhặt lên. Thứ chất nhờn xanh lè vẫn nhỏ giọt từ thủ cấp.
tr: Çok, hem de çok dikkat ederek, aşağıya bakmadan diz çöktü ve canavarın kafasını kara kumaşa sardı, sonra yerden aldı. Kafadan hâlâ yeşil sıvılar damlıyordu.
es: Con mucho cuidado, sin mirar abajo ni un instante, se arrodilló, envolvió la cabeza del monstruo en el paño negro y la recogió. Aún chorreaba un líquido verdoso.
vi_translation: Extremely cautious, without looking down, it wrapped the demon's head in a black cloth and picked it up. The green slime still dripped from the head.
tr_translation: Very, very carefully, without looking down, he knelt and wrapped the monster's head in black cloth, then picked it up from the ground. Green fluids were still dripping from the head.
es_translation: Very carefully, without looking down for even a moment, he knelt, wrapped the monster's head in the black cloth, and picked it up. It was still dripping a greenish liquid.

en: We found some old plastic grocery bags behind the snack counter and double-wrapped Medusa’s head. We plopped it on the table where we’d eaten dinner and sat around it, too exhausted to speak.
vi: Tìm được mấy bịch nhựa, loại hay đựng thực phẩm, đã cũ tôi bọc kín đầu Medusa. Quẳng bọc giấy xuống bàn lúc nãy cả ba còn ngồi mê mải ăn, chúng tôi kéo ghế ngồi, mệt đến độ nói không ra hơi.
tr: Büfe tezgahının arkasında eski plastik torbalardan bulduk ve Medusa'nın kafasını bunlarla iki kez sardık. Yemek yediğimiz masaya küt diye kafayı fırlattık ve etrafına kurulduk. Konuşamayacak kadar yorgunduk.
es: Encontramos unas bolsas de plástico detrás del mostrador y envolvimos varias veces la cabeza de Medusa. La colocamos encima de la mesa en que habíamos cenado y nos sentamos alrededor, demasiado cansados para hablar.
vi_translation: Found some plastic bags, the kind often used for food, I tightly wrapped Medusa's head. Throwing the paper bundle down on the table where all three of us had been engrossed in eating earlier, we pulled up chairs and sat down, too tired to speak.
tr_translation: We found old plastic bags behind the buffet counter and wrapped Medusa's head with them twice. We threw the head onto the table where we were eating with a thud and gathered around it. We were too tired to speak.
es_translation: We found some plastic bags behind the counter and wrapped Medusa's head several times. We placed it on the table where we had dined and sat around, too tired to talk.

en: We camped out in the woods, a hundred yards from the main road, in a marshy clearing that local kids had obviously been using for parties. The ground was littered with flattened soda cans and fast-food wrappers.
vi: Chúng tôi ngủ trong rừng, cách đường chính chừng ba mươi mét, tại một bãi đất trống lầy lội. Thoạt nhìn, ta biết ngay bọn trẻ quanh vùng hay đàn đúm ở đây: mặt đất đầy vỏ lon nước ngọt bẹp dúm và giấy gói đồ ăn nhanh.
tr: Ana yolun 80-90 metre kadar ötesinde, ormanlık alanın bataklık bölgesinde kamp yapıyorduk. O civarda yaşayan gençlerin buralarda sık sık parti verdiği belliydi. Yerler, üzerlerine basılmaktan artık düzleşmiş içecek kutuları ve fast-food ambalajlarıyla kaplıydı.
es: Acampamos en el bosque, a unos cien metros de la carretera principal, en un claro que los chicos de la zona al parecer utilizaban para sus fiestas. El suelo estaba lleno de latas aplastadas, envoltorios de comida rápida y otros desechos.
vi_translation: We slept in the forest, about thirty meters from the main road, in a muddy clearing. At first glance, one could immediately tell that local kids often hung out here: the ground was littered with flattened soda cans and fast food wrappers.
tr_translation: We were camping about 80-90 meters beyond the main road, in the swampy area of the forest. It was clear that the young people living around here often threw parties in these places. The ground was covered with drink cans and fast-food wrappers that had been flattened from being stepped on.
es_translation: We camped in the forest, about a hundred meters from the main road, in a clearing that the local kids apparently used for their parties. The ground was littered with crushed cans, fast food wrappers, and other trash.

en: A shimmering image hovered over the void: my mother, frozen at the moment she’d dissolved in a shower of gold. Her face was distorted with pain, as if the Minotaur were still squeezing her neck. Her eyes looked directly at me, pleading: Go!
vi: Một hình bóng mờ ảo bay lơ lửng giữa lòng vực trống trải: mẹ tôi đứng sững trong tư thế lúc bị biến thành cơn mưa vàng. Mặt mẹ nhăn nhó vì đau như thể quỷ đầu bò vẫn còn siết cổ mẹ. Mắt mẹ nhìn tôi như van lơn: “Chạy đi con!”.
tr: Boşluğun üzerinde pırıl pırıl parlayan bir görüntü belirdi. Annem, bir altın yağmuru altında, kaskatı kesilmiş vaziyette oracıkta duruyordu. Minotorlar onu boğazlıyormuş gibi yüzü acıyla bükülmüştü. Gözleri bana kilitlenmişti, sanki Git! dercesine yalvarıyordu.
es: Se formaba una imagen sobre el abismo: mi madre, congelada en el momento en que se había disuelto en aquel resplandor dorado. Tenía el rostro desencajado por el dolor, como si el Minotauro siguiera retorciéndole el cuello. Me miraba fijamente y sus ojos suplicaban «¡Márchate!».
vi_translation: A vague silhouette floated in the empty chasm: my mother stood frozen in the posture she was in when she was turned into a golden rain. My mother's face was contorted with pain as if the bull-headed demon was still strangling her. My mother's eyes looked at me pleadingly: "Run, my child!".
tr_translation: A bright, shimmering image appeared over the void. My mother stood there, frozen stiff, under a shower of gold. His face was contorted with pain as if minotaurs were strangling him. His eyes were locked onto mine, pleading as if to say Go!
es_translation: An image was forming over the abyss: my mother, frozen in the moment she had dissolved into that golden glow. Her face was contorted with pain, as if the Minotaur were still twisting her neck. She stared at me intently, and her eyes pleaded "Leave!"

en: I tried to keep a low profile because my name and picture were splattered over the front pages of several East Coast newspapers. The Trenton Register-News showed a photo taken by a tourist as I got off the Greyhound bus. I had a wild look in my eyes. My sword was a metallic blur in my hands. It might’ve been a baseball bat or a lacrosse stick.
vi: Tôi cố gắng ẩn mình, càng ít người thấy càng tốt vì ảnh tôi theo nhiều tờ báo đi khắp miền duyên hải phía đông. Tờ Trenton Register News đăng tấm hình khách du lịch chụp tôi vừa chạy từ xe buýt Greyhound. Tôi không tin ở mắt mình: bóng thanh kiếm Thủy triều mờ mờ, trông như tôi đang cầm gậy vụt bóng chày.
tr: Pek ortalıkta dolaşmıyordum çünkü birkaç Doğu Yakası gazetesinin kapaklarını ismim ve yüzüm süslüyordu. Trenton Register-News gazetesinde, Greyhound otobüsünden inerken bir turistin çektiği bir fotoğrafım yayınlanmıştı. Fotoğrafta, gözlerimde tuhaf bir ifade vardı. Elimde tuttuğum kılıcım, metalik mavi renk gözüküyordu. Elimdeki kılıç değil de pek ala bir beyzbol veya başka bir oyun sopası da olabilirdi.
es: Intenté pasar inadvertido porque mi nombre y mi foto aparecían en varios periódicos de la costa Este. El Trenton Register—News mostraba la fotografía que me hizo un turista al bajar del autobús Greyhound. Tenía la mirada ida. La espada era un borrón metálico en mis manos. Habría podido ser un bate de béisbol o un palo de lacrosse.
vi_translation: I tried to hide myself, the fewer people saw me, the better, because my photos were being circulated by many newspapers throughout the eastern coastal region. The Trenton Register News published a picture taken by a tourist of me just as I was running from a Greyhound bus. I couldn't believe my eyes: the shadow of the Tide sword was faintly visible, making it look like I was holding a baseball bat.
tr_translation: I wasn't out and about much because my name and face were gracing the covers of a few East Coast newspapers. A photo of me taken by a tourist while I was getting off a Greyhound bus had been published in the Trenton Register-News. In the photo, there was a strange expression in my eyes. The sword I was holding appeared metallic blue. What I was holding could very well have been a baseball bat or some other kind of game bat instead of a sword.
es_translation: I tried to go unnoticed because my name and photo appeared in several newspapers on the East Coast. The Trenton Register-News showed the photograph a tourist took of me as I got off the Greyhound bus. I had a vacant look in my eyes. The sword was a metallic blur in my hands. It could have been a baseball bat or a lacrosse stick.

en: She had beady eyes; pointy, coffee-stained teeth; a floppy denim hat, and a denim dress that bulged so much, she looked like a blue-jean blimp.
vi: Mắt bà ta tròn xoe, răng nhọn và đen như nghiện cà phê. Bà này đội mũ vải jeans, mặc váy may cùng chất liệu chật cứng, ngấn thịt nổi từng cuộn khiến bà ta trông giống quả khinh khí cầu bọc vải.
tr: Kadının pörtlek gözleri; sivri, kahve lekeli dişleri; gevşek duran, kot benzeri bir kumaştan yapılmış bir şapkası ve yine aynı kumaştan yapılmış çuval gibi bir elbisesi vardı. Bu elbişeyle kottan yapılmış bir balon gibi gözüküyordu.
es: Tenía ojos negros y brillantes; dientes puntiagudos y manchados de café; llevaba un sombrero tejano de ala flácida, y un vestido que le sacaba tantos michelines que parecía un zepelín vaquero.
vi_translation: Her eyes were wide open, her teeth sharp and black as if addicted to coffee. She wore a jeans fabric hat, a tightly fitting dress made of the same material, with rolls of flesh bulging out, making her look like a fabric-covered hot air balloon.
tr_translation: The woman had bulging eyes; sharp, coffee-stained teeth; a loosely fitting hat made of a denim-like fabric, and a sack-like dress made of the same fabric. She looked like a balloon made of denim in this outfit.
es_translation: She had black, shiny eyes; sharp, coffee-stained teeth; wore a floppy-brimmed cowboy hat, and a dress that squeezed out so many rolls of fat that she looked like a cowboy zeppelin.

en: My whole leg was on fire. I tried to jab Riptide into the Chimera’s mouth, but the serpent tail wrapped around my ankles and pulled me off balance, and my blade flew out of my hand, spinning out of the hole in the Arch and down toward the Mississippi River.
vi: Toàn thân tôi như có lửa thiêu. Tôi cố đâm mũi kiếm vào miệng Chimera nhưng bị đuôi rắn quấn quanh cổ chân, lôi tôi ngã nhào. Kiếm tuột khỏi tay văng đến lỗ thủng khi nãy và rơi xuống dòng Mississippi.
tr: Tüm bacağım ateş gibi yanıyordu. Dalgakıran'ı, Kimera'nın ağzına tıkmaya çalıştım ama sürüngen kuyruğu, bacaklarıma dolanıp, dengemi alt üst etti. Bu sırada, kılıcım elimden fırlayarak Kemer'deki boşluktan aşağı düştü ve Mississippi Nehri'nin akınüsma kapılarak gözden kayboldu.
es: Sentí la pierna entera arder. Intenté clavarle la espada en la boca, pero la cola se revolvió y me hizo trastabillar. La espada se me escurrió entre las manos y cayó por el boquete a las aguas del Mississipi.
vi_translation: My whole body felt like it was on fire. I tried to thrust my sword into the Chimera's mouth, but the snake's tail coiled around my ankle and pulled me down. The sword slipped from my hand, flew to the hole from earlier, and fell into the Mississippi River.
tr_translation: My entire leg was burning like fire. I tried to shove the Breakwater into the Chimera's mouth, but its serpentine tail coiled around my legs, throwing me off balance. At that moment, my sword flew out of my hand and fell through the gap in the Kemer, disappearing into the Mississippi River's current.
es_translation: I felt my entire leg burning. I tried to stab it in the mouth with my sword, but its tail lashed out and made me stumble. The sword slipped from my hands and fell through the hole into the waters of the Mississippi.

en: I’d love to tell you I had some deep revelation on my way down, that I came to terms with my own mortality, laughed in the face of death, et cetera.
vi: Tôi thích tự nhận rằng khi cắm đầu lao xuống, tôi ngộ ra chân lý cuộc đời, rằng cái chết không còn đáng sợ v. v.. và v. v...
tr: Nehre doğru düşerken derin bir farkındalığa eriştiğimi, ölümlü halimle barışık olduğumu, ölümle dalga geçtiğimi ve buna benzer bir sürü şey daha söylemek isterdim sizlere.
es: Me encantaría contarte que tuve una profunda revelación durante mi caída, que acepté mi propia mortalidad, que me reí en la cara de la muerte, etcétera.
vi_translation: I like to claim that when I plunge headfirst, I realize the truth of life, that death is no longer frightening, etc., etc...
tr_translation: I would like to tell you that as I was falling towards the river, I reached a deep awareness, that I was at peace with my mortal self, that I was mocking death, and many other similar things.
es_translation: I would love to tell you that I had a profound revelation during my fall, that I accepted my own mortality, that I laughed in the face of death, etcetera.

en: At that point, I realized a few things: first, I had not been flattened into a pancake. I had not been barbecued. I couldn’t even feel the Chimera poison boiling in my veins anymore. I was alive, which was good.
vi: Lúc ấy, tôi nhận ra vài điều. Thứ nhất: Người tôi không dẹp lép như bánh xếp. May mà trước khi nhảy, tôi chưa thành thịt nướng. Nọc độc của Chimera không còn sục sôi trong mạch máu nữa. Tôi còn sống, thế là tốt rồi.
tr: Bu noktada birkaç şey fark ettim. İlk olarak, bir krep gibi dümdüz olmamıştım. Kimse beni barbekü yapmamıştı. Hatta, artık damarlarımda Kimera'nın zehrini bile hissetmiyordum. Hayattaydım ki, bu da iyi bir şeydi.
es: En ese punto reparé en unas cuantas cosas: primero, no me había convertido en una tortita al estrellarme; segundo, no me habían asado a la parrilla; y, tercero, ni siquiera sentía ya el veneno de Quimera en las venas. Simplemente estaba vivo, y era genial.
vi_translation: At that moment, I realized a few things. First: My body is not flattened like a dumpling. Luckily, before jumping, I hadn't turned into grilled meat. The Chimera's venom no longer boils in my veins. I'm still alive, that's good.
tr_translation: At this point, I realized a few things. First of all, I hadn't been flattened like a pancake. No one had barbecued me. In fact, I no longer even felt the venom of Chimera in my veins. I was alive, which was a good thing.
es_translation: At that point, I noticed a few things: first, I hadn't turned into a pancake upon crashing; second, I hadn't been grilled; and third, I no longer even felt the Chimera's venom in my veins. I was simply alive, and it was great.

en: No response. Just the dark drift of garbage downriver, the enormous catfish gliding by, the flash of sunset on the water’s surface far above, turning everything the color of butterscotch.
vi: Không lời đáp. Xung quanh chỉ có rác nối nhau trôi theo dòng, một con cá da trơn to khổng tượng lướt qua và ánh nắng lúc hoàng hôn tít trên cao xuyên qua làn nước chở nặng phù sa biến tất cả thành màu kẹo bơ caremen.
tr: Yanıt gelmedi. Duyduğum tek şey, nehirden aşağı doğrusürüklenen çöpler, devasa bir kedi balığının süzülüşü, ta yukarılarda gün batımının suyun yüzeyine vuruşu ve her şeyi karamela rengine döndürmesiydi.
es: No hubo respuesta. Sólo la oscura corriente de basura, el enorme siluro siguiendo su rastro, el reflejo del atardecer en la superficie del agua, allá arriba, volviéndolo todo de color caramelo.
vi_translation: No response. All around, only trash floated along the current, a giant catfish glided by, and the sunlight at sunset high above pierced through the silt-laden water, turning everything into a caramel candy color.
tr_translation: No response came. The only thing I heard was the trash drifting down the river, the glide of a massive catfish, the sunset hitting the water's surface way up high and turning everything into a caramel color.
es_translation: There was no response. Only the dark current of garbage, the enormous catfish following its trail, the reflection of the sunset on the surface of the water, up above, turning everything the color of caramel.

en: A news lady was talking for the camera: “Probably not a terrorist attack, we’re told, but it’s still very early in the investigation. The damage, as you can see, is very serious. We’re trying to get to some of the survivors, to question them about eyewitness reports of someone falling from the Arch.”
vi: Có nữ phóng viên nói trước ống kính: - Theo chúng tôi được biết, đây có lẽ không phải là một vụ khủng bố. Tuy nhiên, các nhà chức trách mới trong giai đoạn đầu của cuộc điều tra. Như quý vị thấy, tổn hại là rất nghiêm trọng. Chúng tôi đang cố gắng tiếp cận nhóm người sống sót. Họ chứng kiến tận mắt có người ngã từ đỉnh Gateway Arch.
tr: Bir spiker kameraların karşısında konuşuyordu. "Bize söylendiğine göre, bu büyük bir ihtimalle bir terörist saldırısı değil ama henüz kapsamlı bir araştırma yapılmadı. Gördüğünüz gibi, hasar çok büyük. Kemer'den düşen biriyle ilgili bilgi almak için kurtulan görgü tanıklarını bulmaya çalışıyoruz.
es: Una mujer de las noticias hablaba para la cámara: —Probablemente no ha sido un ataque terrorista, nos dicen, pero la investigación acaba de empezar. El daño, como ven, es muy grave. Intentamos llegar a alguno de los supervivientes para interrogarlos sobre las declaraciones de testigos presenciales que indican que alguien cayó del arco.
vi_translation: A female reporter spoke in front of the camera: - According to what we know, this is probably not a terrorist attack. However, the authorities are still in the early stages of the investigation. As you can see, the damage is very severe. We are trying to reach the group of survivors. They witnessed firsthand someone falling from the top of the Gateway Arch.
tr_translation: A news anchor was speaking in front of the cameras. "We have been told that this is most likely not a terrorist attack, but a comprehensive investigation has not yet been conducted. As you can see, the damage is extensive. We are trying to find surviving eyewitnesses to get information about someone who fell from the bridge."
es_translation: A woman from the news was speaking to the camera: —It was probably not a terrorist attack, they tell us, but the investigation has just begun. The damage, as you can see, is very serious. We are trying to reach some of the survivors to question them about eyewitness statements indicating that someone fell from the arch.

en: Then I was looking through the mist at strawberry fields, and the Long Island Sound in the distance. We seemed to be on the porch of the Big House. Standing with his back to us at the railing was a sandy-haired guy in shorts and an orange tank top. He was holding a bronze sword and seemed to be staring intently at something down in the meadow.
vi: Giây lát sau, sau màn sương hiện lên ruộng dâu, eo biển Long Island phía xa như thể chúng tôi đang đứng trên thềm Nhà Lớn vậy. Cạnh lan can quanh thềm, quay lưng lại phía tôi là một thanh niên tóc vàng mặc quần soóc và áo thun da cam. Tay cầm kiếm đồng, anh ra chăm chú quan sát cánh đồng cỏ.
tr: Sonra, kendimi puslu Çilek tarlalarına ve Long Island Koyu'na bakarken buldum. Büyük Ev'in verandasında duruyorduk sanki. Tırabzanlarda, bize arkası dönük vaziyette duran, bir şort ve turuncu bir penye tişört giymiş kumral bir adam duruyordu. Elinde bronz bir kılıç vardı ve pür dikkat otlaklara bakıyordu.
es: Después tuve ante mí la niebla sobre los campos de fresas, y el canal de Long Island Sound en la distancia. Era como si estuviéramos en el porche de la Casa Grande. De pie, dándonos la espalda, había un tipo de pelo rubio apoyado en la barandilla, vestido con pantalones cortos y camiseta naranja. Tenía una espada de bronce en la mano y parecía estar mirando fijamente algo en el prado.
vi_translation: A moment later, through the mist, a mulberry field appeared, with the Long Island Sound in the distance as if we were standing on the porch of the Big House. By the railing around the porch, with his back turned to me, was a young man with blond hair wearing shorts and an orange T-shirt. Holding a bronze sword, he was intently observing the meadow.
tr_translation: Then, I found myself looking at the misty Strawberry fields and Long Island Sound. It was as if we were standing on the porch of the Big House. On the railings, there was a sandy-haired man wearing shorts and an orange t-shirt, standing with his back to us. He had a bronze sword in his hand and was intently watching the meadows.
es_translation: Then I had before me the fog over the strawberry fields, and the Long Island Sound channel in the distance. It was as if we were on the porch of the Big House. Standing, with his back to us, there was a blond-haired guy leaning on the railing, dressed in shorts and an orange t-shirt. He had a bronze sword in his hand and seemed to be staring at something in the meadow.

en: “Probably. That’s cool. I don’t fight my kids’ fights, you know? What I’m here for-I heard you were in town. I got a little proposition for you.”
vi: - Chắc vậy. Mày cũng được đấy. Chuyện trẻ con đánh nhau, tao không dính vào. Tao đến đây vì... vì nghe nói mày ghé Denver chơi. Tao định gợi ý mày một chuyện.
tr: "Olabilir. Neyse. Çocuklarımın kavgalarına karışmam. Burada olmamın sebebi... Şehre gelmiş olduğunu duymam. Sana küçük bir önerim var.
es: —Probablemente. No intervengo en las batallas de mis críos, ¿sabes? He venido para... He oído que estabas en la ciudad y tengo una proposición que hacerte.
vi_translation: - Probably. You're pretty good too. Kid fights, I don't get involved. I came here because... because I heard you were visiting Denver. I wanted to suggest something to you.
tr_translation: "It could be. Anyway. I don't get involved in my children's fights. The reason I'm here... is that I heard you came to town. I have a small suggestion for you."
es_translation: —Probably. I don't get involved in my kids' battles, you know? I've come to... I heard you were in town and I have a proposition for you.

en: She snatched an entire row of stuff of the racks and disappeared into the changing room. A few minutes later she came out in Waterland flower-print shorts, a big red Waterland T-shirt, and commemorative Waterland surf shoes. A Waterland backpack was slung over her shoulder, obviously stuffed with more goodies.
vi: Ôm hết quần áo trên dãy móc dài, Annabeth biến mất trong phòng thay đồ. Mấy phút sau, bạn ấy trở ra với quần soóc in hoa, áo thun đỏ in chữ Waterland và đôi giày thể thao mang tên khu vui chơi. Annabeth đeo trên vai ba lô căng phồng in logo của công viên nước.
tr: Raflardan bir dolu kıyafet alıp, giyinme odasına girdi. Birkaç dakika sonra, Su Dünyası çiçek desenli şortu, büyük bir Su Dünyası tişörtü ve Su Dünyası sörf ayakkabıları giymiş vaziyette çıktı. Omzunda, içi bir sürü şeyle dolu bir Su Dünyası çantası asılıydı.
es: Agarró una hilera llena de cosas y desapareció en el vestidor. A los pocos minutos salió con unos pantalones cortos de flores de Waterland, una gran camiseta roja de Waterland y unas zapatillas surferas del aniversario de Waterland. También llevaba una mochila Waterland colgada del hombro, llena con más cosas.
vi_translation: Gathering all the clothes from the long row of hooks, Annabeth disappeared into the changing room. A few minutes later, she came out wearing floral shorts, a red T-shirt with "Waterland" printed on it, and sneakers branded with the amusement park's name. Annabeth had a bulging backpack with the water park's logo on her shoulder.
tr_translation: She took a bunch of clothes from the shelves and entered the dressing room. A few minutes later, she came out wearing a Water World floral patterned shorts, a large Water World t-shirt, and Water World surf shoes. On her shoulder hung a Water World bag filled with a lot of things.
es_translation: He grabbed a row full of things and disappeared into the dressing room. A few minutes later, he came out wearing Waterland floral shorts, a large red Waterland t-shirt, and Waterland anniversary surf shoes. He was also carrying a Waterland backpack slung over his shoulder, filled with more things.

en: The moment I touched the shield, I knew we were in trouble. My hand broke through something that had been connecting it to the dashboard. A cobweb, I thought, but then I looked at a strand of it on my palm and saw it was some kind of metal filament, so fine it was almost invisible. A trip wire.
vi: Tay vừa chạm khiên, tôi biết ngay có sự chẳng lành. Bàn tay tôi vừa xuyên qua một thứ nối khiên với bảng điều khiển của xuồng máy. Tôi tưởng mạng nhện, nhưng khi giơ tay lên nhìn kỹ, hóa ra đó là dây kim loại rất mảnh, mắt thường gần như không nhìn thấy được. Một đoạn dây bẫy.
tr: Kalkana dokunduğum anda başımızın belada olduğunu anladım. Elim, kalkanı tutma yeriyle birleştiren yerde bir şeye takıldı. Örümcek ağı falan herhalde diye düşünürken, elime bulaşan şeye baktım ve bunun bir çeşit metal tel olduğunu fark ettim. O kadar inceydi ki, neredeyse görünmezdi. Bu bir tuzaktı.
es: En el momento en que toqué el escudo supe que teníamos problemas. Mi mano rompió algo que lo unía al tablero de mandos. Una telaraña, pensé, pero lo examiné en la palma y vi que era un delgado filamento de metal. Estaba puesto ahí para tropezar con él.
vi_translation: As soon as my hand touched the shield, I knew something was wrong. My hand had just passed through something that connected the shield to the control panel of the motorboat. I thought it was a spider web, but when I raised my hand to look closely, it turned out to be a very thin metal wire, almost invisible to the naked eye. A segment of a trap wire.
tr_translation: The moment I touched the shield, I realized we were in trouble. My hand got caught on something where the handle of the shield connected. Thinking it was probably a spider web or something, I looked at what had stuck to my hand and realized it was some kind of metal wire. It was so thin that it was almost invisible. This was a trap.
es_translation: The moment I touched the shield, I knew we were in trouble. My hand broke something that connected it to the control panel. A spider web, I thought, but I examined it in my palm and saw that it was a thin metal filament. It was placed there to trip over it.

en: Up on the rim, the Cupid statues were drawing their bows into firing position. Before I could suggest taking cover, they shot, but not at us. They fired at each other, across the rim of the pool. Silky cables trailed from the arrows, arcing over the pool and anchoring where they landed to form a huge golden asterisk. Then smaller metallic threads started weaving together magically between the main strands, making a net.
vi: Quanh thành hồ hình tròn, tượng Cupid giơ cung ngắm bán. Tôi chưa kịp kêu Annabeth tìm chỗ nấp, họ đã nhả tên. Nhưng họ không bắn chúng thôi mà bắn lẫn nhau: Tượng bên này bắn sang thành hồ đối diện. Những sợi dây kim loại mảnh theo mũi tên găm sang bờ bên kia tạo thành hình hoa thị bằng vàng. Sau đó, những sợi chỉ kim loại nhỏ xíu tự đan vào nhau dệt nên tấm lưới khổng lồ.
tr: Kenardaki Eros heykelleri yaylarını germeye başladılar. Kaçın, saklanın, diye bağırmaya fırsat bulamadan, oklar yaydan fırlamıştı bile. Ama hedef biz değildik. Havuzun kenarlarından birbirlerine ok atıyorlardı. Oklardan çıkan incecik kablolar havuzun üzerinde birer yay çizip, karşı tarafa mıhlandı. Tellerin birleştikleri yerde kocaman, altın bir yıldız oluşmuştu. Sonra, daha ufak metal iplikçikler de gizemli bir biçimde birleşmeye başlayarak bir ağ ördüler. Oklardan incecik kablolar çıkıyor, havuzun üzerinden, aşağıya doğru nişan alıyordu. Birleştikleri yerde kocaman, altın bir yıldız oluşturuyorlardı. Sonra, daha ufak metal parçalar da gizemli bir biçimde birleşmeye başlayarak bir ağ ördüler.
es: Arriba, en el borde, las estatuas de Cupido tensaban sus arcos en posición de disparo. Sin darnos tiempo de ponernos a cubierto, dispararon, pero no hacia nosotros sino unas a otras, a ambos lados de la piscina. Las flechas arrastraban cables sedosos que describían arcos sobre la piscina y se clavaban en el borde, formando un enorme entramado dorado. Entonces, por arte de magia, empezaron a tejerse hilos metálicos más pequeños, entrelazándose hasta formar una red.
vi_translation: Around the circular lake, Cupid statues aimed their bows. I hadn't had time to tell Annabeth to find cover before they released their arrows. But they didn't shoot at us; they shot at each other: The statues on one side shot towards the opposite side of the lake. Thin metal wires followed the arrows and embedded themselves on the other shore, forming a golden star pattern. Then, the tiny metal threads wove themselves together to create a gigantic net.
tr_translation: The Eros statues on the corners began to draw their bows. Before we could shout, "Run, hide," the arrows had already been released from the bows. But we were not the target. They were shooting arrows at each other from the edges of the pool. The thin cables from the arrows arched over the pool and anchored on the opposite side. At the point where the wires met, a large golden star had formed. Then, smaller metal threads also began to mysteriously intertwine, weaving a net. Thin cables were emerging from the arrows, aiming downward over the pool. Where they converged, they formed a huge, golden star. Then, smaller metal pieces also began to mysteriously merge, weaving a web.
es_translation: Above, on the edge, the statues of Cupid drew their bows in shooting position. Without giving us time to take cover, they shot, but not at us, instead at each other, on both sides of the pool. The arrows dragged silky cables that described arcs over the pool and embedded themselves on the edge, forming a huge golden lattice. Then, as if by magic, smaller metallic threads began to weave, intertwining until they formed a net.

en: It was an army of wind-up creepy-crawlies: bronze-gear bodies, spindly legs, little pincer mouths, all scuttling toward us in a wave of clacking, whirring metal.
vi: Dòng chảy của những con vật ghê rợn tuồn vào mãi: mình bằng đồng, tám chân khẳng khiu và miệng nhỏ ngáp liên tục.
tr: Bronzdan yapılmış bedenler, örümcek bacakları ve minik kıskaçlı ağızlar, metalik sesler çıkararak, kurulmuş oyuncaklar gibi üzerimize üzerimize geliyordu.
es: Parecía un ejército de bichitos de cuerda: cuerpos de bronce, patas puntiagudas y afiladas pinzas, y se dirigían hacia nosotros como una marabunta, en una oleada de chasquidos y zumbidos metálicos.
vi_translation: The flow of terrifying creatures kept pouring in: bodies made of bronze, eight spindly legs, and small mouths continuously gaping.
tr_translation: Bodies made of bronze, spider legs, and tiny pincered mouths were coming at us like wound-up toys, making metallic sounds.
es_translation: It looked like an army of wind-up bugs: bronze bodies, pointed legs, and sharp pincers, and they were heading towards us like a swarm, in a wave of metallic clicks and buzzes.

en: I’d never seen her like this before. She fell backward in terror and almost got overwhelmed by the spider robots before I pulled her up and dragged her back toward the boat.
vi: a Tôi chưa từng thấy Annabeth hoảng loạn như thế. Cô bé kinh hoàng ngã ngửa, suýt bị lũ nhện rôbốt chôn vùi nếu tôi không nhanh tay kéo lên và lôi về phía thuyền.
tr: Onu hiç böyle görmemiştim. Korkuyla arkaya yuvarlandı ve ben yerden kaldırıp kayığa doğru sürüklemesem, neredeyse örümcek robotlara yem olacaktı.
es: Nunca la había visto así. Trastabilló y cayó hacia atrás, presa del pánico, y las arañas robot casi la cubrieron completamente antes de que lograse levantarla y tirar de ella hacia el bote.
vi_translation: I had never seen Annabeth panic like that. She was terrified and fell backward, almost getting buried by the robot spiders if I hadn't quickly pulled her up and dragged her towards the boat.
tr_translation: I had never seen him like this before. He tumbled backward in fear, and if I hadn't picked him up from the ground and dragged him towards the boat, he would have almost become food for the spider robots.
es_translation: He had never seen her like this. She stumbled and fell backward, panic-stricken, and the robot spiders almost completely covered her before he managed to lift her and pull her towards the boat.

en: Ares grabbed the shield and spun it in the air like pizza dough. It changed form, melting into a bulletproof vest. He slung it across his back.
vi: Chộp ngay tấm khiên, thần Ares xoay nó trên không như miếng bột bánh pizza, biến nó thành áo chống đạn. Ông ta khoác áo lên vai.
tr: Ares kalkanını aldı ve sanki bir pizza hamuru gibi havaya fırlattı. Kalkan şekil değiştirerek, kurşun geçirmez bir yeleğe dönüştü. Ares bunu alıp sırtına geçirdi.
es: Ares agarró el escudo y lo hizo girar en el aire como una masa de pizza. Cambió de forma y se convirtió en un chaleco antibalas. Se lo colocó por la espalda.
vi_translation: Grabbing the shield immediately, the god Ares spun it in the air like a pizza dough, turning it into a bulletproof vest. He draped the vest over his shoulders.
tr_translation: Ares took his shield and tossed it into the air as if it were a pizza dough. The shield transformed into a bulletproof vest. Ares took it and put it on his back.
es_translation: Ares grabbed the shield and spun it in the air like a pizza dough. It changed shape and turned into a bulletproof vest. He placed it on his back.

en: The trailer was dark inside until I uncapped Anaklusmos. The blade cast a faint bronze light over a very sad scene. Sitting in a row of filthy metal cages were three of the most pathetic zoo animals I’d ever beheld: a zebra, a male albino lion, and some weird antelope thing I didn’t know the name for.
vi: Trong xe tối mù. Tôi mở nắp bút, dùng ánh sáng từ kiếm Thủy triều quan sát khung cảnh não nề. Ba chuồng sắt bẩn thỉu xếp thành dãy nhốt ba con thú hoang trông sầu thảm chưa từng thấy: một ngựa vằn, một sư tử đực lông trắng và một con thuộc loài linh dương trông rất lạ. Chuồng sư tử có bao củ cải.
tr: Dalgakıran'ın kapağını açana kadar treyler kapkaranlıktı. Kılıçtan gelen zayıf bir ışık, hayatımda gördüğüm en acıklı sahneyi aydınlattı. Pis metal kafeslerin içinde, üç zavallı hayvan vardı. Biri bir zebraydı, ikincisi erkek bir albino aslan ve sonuncusu da adını bile bilmediğim antilop türü bir hayvan.
es: El interior del camión estaba oscuro, hasta que destapé a Anaklusmos. La espada arrojó una débil luz broncínea sobre una escena muy triste. En una fila de jaulas asquerosas había tres de los animales de zoo más patéticos que había visto jamás: una cebra, un león albino y una especie de antílope raro.
vi_translation: It was pitch dark inside the car. I opened the cap of my pen, using the light from the Tide Sword to observe the dismal scene. Three filthy iron cages arranged in a row contained three wild animals that looked more miserable than ever seen: a zebra, a white-maned lion, and a very strange-looking antelope. The lion's cage has a bunch of radishes.
tr_translation: Until the hatch of the breakwater was opened, the trailer was pitch dark. A weak light from the sword illuminated the most pitiful scene I had ever seen in my life. Inside the filthy metal cages, there were three miserable animals. One was a zebra, the second a male albino lion, and the last an antelope-like animal whose name I didn't even know.
es_translation: The inside of the truck was dark until I uncovered Anaklusmos. The sword cast a faint bronze light over a very sad scene. In a row of filthy cages were three of the most pathetic zoo animals I had ever seen: a zebra, an albino lion, and some kind of rare antelope.

en: “Yeah,” she said. “Every August, the counselors pick the most important event of the summer, and they paint it on that year’s beads. I’ve got Thalia’s pine tree, a Greek trireme on fire, a centaur in a prom dress-now that was a weird summer….”
vi: - Ừ. Mỗi năm, cứ đến tháng 8, các nhân viên tư vấn của trại chọn một sự kiện quan trọng nhất của mùa hè để vẽ hạt sứ. Tớ có hình cây thông của Thalia, tàu chiến cổ ba tầng chèo bốc cháy, nhân mã mặc váy dạ hội… mùa hè này lạ nhất…
tr: "Evet," dedi. "Her Ağustos ayında, heyettekiler yazın en mühim olayını seçer ve bunu o senenin boncuğu üzerine kazırlar. Bende Thalia'nın çam ağacı, yanan bir Yunan kadırgası, balo kıyafetli bir sentor boncuğu var... Bayağı tuhaf bir yazdı...
es: —Sí —contestó—. Cada agosto, los consejeros eligen el evento más importante del verano y lo pintan en las cuentas de ese año. Tengo el pino de Thalia, un trirreme griego en llamas, un centauro con traje de graduación... Bueno, ése sí que fue un verano raro...
vi_translation: - Yes. Every year, in August, the camp counselors choose the most important event of the summer to paint on the ceramic beads. I have the image of Thalia's pine tree, a burning ancient trireme, a centaur in a ball gown... this summer is the strangest...
tr_translation: "Yes," he said. "Every August, the members of the council choose the most important event of the summer and engrave it on that year's bead. I have a bead with Thalia's pine tree, a burning Greek trireme, and a centaur in a ball gown... It was quite a strange summer..."
es_translation: —Yes —he replied—. Every August, the counselors choose the most important event of the summer and paint it on the beads for that year. I have Thalia's pine tree, a Greek trireme in flames, a centaur in a graduation suit... Well, that was indeed a strange summer...

en: The trucker threw the antelope a squashed-looking Happy Meal bag. He smirked at the zebra. “How ya doin’, Stripes? Least we’ll be getting rid of you this stop. You like magic shows? You’re gonna love this one. They’re gonna saw you in half!”
vi: Gã tài xế ném cho linh lương bao tải đựng cái gì giống bí xanh. Hắn bĩu môi nhìn ngựa vằn: - Khỏe không, đồ vằn vện? Ít nhất ta cũng tống khứ ngươi ở trạm dừng này. Ngươi thích sân khấu ảo thuật không? Màn diễn sắp tới tuyệt vời. Người ta sẽ cưa ngươi thành 2 khúc.
tr: Kamyoncu, antilobun önüne AFİYET OLSUN yazan ezilmiş bir paket fırlattı. Zebraya sırıttı, "N'aber, çizgili? En azından senden burada kurtulacağız. Sihirbazlık gösterilerini sever misin? Bak buna bayılacaksın. Seni ikiye bölecekler.
es: El camionero le lanzó al antílope una bolsa de Happy Meal aplastada. Le dedicó una sonrisita malévola a la cebra. —¿Qué tal te va, Rayas? Al menos de ti nos deshacemos en esta parada. ¿Te gustan los espectáculos de magia? Éste te va a encantar. ¡Van a serrarte por la mitad!
vi_translation: The driver threw a sack containing something that looked like a green squash to the spirit. He pursed his lips and looked at the zebra: - How are you, striped one? At least I'll get rid of you at this stop. Do you like magic shows? The next act is amazing. They will saw you in half.
tr_translation: The truck driver threw a crushed package in front of the antelope that said BON APPÉTIT. He grinned at the zebra, "What's up, stripey? At least we'll get rid of you here. Do you like magic shows? You're going to love this. They're going to cut you in half."
es_translation: The truck driver threw a crushed Happy Meal bag at the antelope. He gave the zebra a malicious grin. —How's it going, Rayas? At least we get rid of you at this stop. Do you like magic shows? You're going to love this one. They're going to saw you in half!

en: “Meaning they’ll reach the wild safely,” he said. “They’ll find water, food, shade, whatever they need until they find a safe place to live.”
vi: - Nghĩa là chúng sẽ về rừng an toàn. Chúng sẽ tìm được nước uống, thức ăn, … bất cứ thứ gì chúng cần cho tới khi về được chỗ cũ.
tr: "Yani vahşi doğaya kazasız belasız varacaklar," dedi. "Su, yiyecek, gölgelik alan, artık ihtiyaçları her neyse, kolaylıkla yaşayabilecekleri güvenli bir yer bulabilecekler.
es: —Significa que llegarán a la espesura a salvo —dijo—. Encontrarán agua, comida, sombra, todo lo que necesiten hasta hallar un lugar donde vivir a salvo.
vi_translation: - It means they will return to the forest safely. They will find water, food, ... anything they need until they reach their old place.
tr_translation: "So they will reach the wilderness without any accidents or troubles," he said. "Water, food, shade, whatever their needs are, they will find a safe place where they can live easily."
es_translation: —It means they will reach the thicket safely —he said—. They will find water, food, shade, everything they need until they find a place to live safely.

en: “No, no,” he said, laughing. “The bill’s taken care of. No extra charges, no tips. Just go on up to the top floor, loom 4001. If you need anything, like extra bubbles for the hot tub, or skeet targets for the shooting range, or whatever, just call the front desk. Here are your LotusCash cards. They work in the restaurants and on all the games and rides.”
vi: Ông ta cười xòa: - Đừng lo. Có người thanh toán mọi khoản rồi. Ở đây không thu phụ phí, không đòi tiền boa. Cứ lên phòng trên cùng, phòng 4001. Nếu cần bất cứ thứ gì, chẳng hạn thêm dầu tạo bọt cho bồn tắm nước nóng hay đạn đất sét tập bắn chim câu, cứ việc gọi tiếp tân. Đây là thẻ tín dụng LotusCash dùng trong nhà hàng, các máy chơi game và mọi phương tiện đi lại.
tr: "Hayır, hayır," dedi çocuk gülerek. "Hesap ödendi bile. Fazladan bir şey ödemeyeceksiniz. Sadece en üst kata çıkın ve 4001 numaralı odaya gidin. Banyo köpüğü veya atış talimi için hedef gibi bir şeye ihtiyacınız olursa, hemen resepsiyonu arayın. İşte bunlar da LotusNakit kartlarınız. Bunlar restoranlarda, tüm oyunlarda ve diğer aktivitelerde geçerlidir.
es: —No, no —dijo sonriendo—. La cuenta está pagada. No tienen que pagar nada ni dar propinas. Sencillamente suban a la última planta, habitación cuatro mil uno. Si necesitan algo, como más burbujas para la bañera caliente, o platos en el campo de tiro, lo que sea, llamen a recepción. Aquí tienen sus tarjetas LotusCash. Funcionan en los restaurantes y en todos los juegos y atracciones.
vi_translation: He laughed heartily: - Don't worry. Someone has already paid for everything. There are no additional fees here, no tipping required. Just go to the top floor, room 4001. If you need anything, such as extra bubble bath for the hot tub or clay pigeon shooting ammo, just call the reception. This is a LotusCash credit card for use in the restaurant, gaming machines, and all transportation.
tr_translation: "No, no," said the child, laughing. "The bill has already been paid. You won't have to pay anything extra. Just go to the top floor and head to room 4001. If you need something like bath foam or a target for shooting practice, just call the reception immediately. Here are your LotusCash cards. These are valid at restaurants, all games, and other activities."
es_translation: —No, no —he said, smiling—. The bill is paid. You don't have to pay anything or give tips. Simply go up to the top floor, room four thousand one. If you need anything, like more bubbles for the hot tub, or plates at the shooting range, whatever it is, call reception. Here are your LotusCash cards. They work in the restaurants and in all the games and attractions.

en: Then we burst through the doors of the Lotus Casino and ran down the sidewalk. It felt like afternoon, about the same time of day we’d gone into the casino, but something was wrong. The weather had completely changed. It was stormy, with heat lightning flashing out in the desert.
vi: Lát sau, ba đứa đẩy cửa sòng bài Hoa Sen, hoảng hốt chạy dọc con phố. Bên ngoài là buổi chiều, tầm giờ lúc vào khách sạn. Nhưng thực ra không phải. Hôm nay thời tiết u ám, chớp rạch ngang bầu trời ngoài sa mạc.
tr: Sonra, Lotus Kumarhanesi'nin kapılarından apar topar dışarı çıktık ve kaldırımda koşmaya başladık. Kumarhaneye girdiğimiz zamanki gibi öğleden sonraydı ama bir terslik vardı. Hava tamamıyla değişmişti. Fırtına çıkmış, çölde şimşekler çakıyordu.
es: Salimos a toda prisa del Casino Loto y corrimos por la acera. Era por la tarde, aproximadamente la misma hora del día que habíamos entrado en el casino, pero algo no cuadraba. El clima había cambiado por completo. Había tormenta y el desierto rielaba por el calor.
vi_translation: Moments later, the three of them pushed open the door of the Hoa Sen casino, panicked, and ran along the street. Outside, it was the afternoon, around the time they had entered the hotel. But in reality, it wasn't. Today, the weather was gloomy, with lightning streaking across the desert sky.
tr_translation: Then, we hurriedly ran out of the doors of the Lotus Casino and started running on the sidewalk. It was afternoon, just like when we entered the casino, but something was wrong. The weather had completely changed. A storm had broken out, and lightning was striking in the desert.
es_translation: We hurried out of the Loto Casino and ran along the sidewalk. It was in the afternoon, approximately the same time of day we had entered the casino, but something didn't add up. The weather had changed completely. There was a storm and the desert shimmered with heat.

en: The cigar fell out of the driver’s mouth. He looked back at us, his eyes wide. “Where to in Los Angeles… uh, Your Highness?”
vi: Điếu xì gà rớt khỏi miệng bác tài. Ông ngạc nhiên nhìn chúng tôi: - Đến địa điểm nào ở Los Angeles, thưa… Quý Cô?
tr: Şoförün sigarası ağzından düştü. Gözlerini fal taşı gibi açarak, bize döndü, "Los Angeles'ta nereye gitmek istersiniz, şey... Majesteleri?" diye sordu.
es: Al hombre se le cayó el puro de la boca. Volvió a mirarnos, esta vez con los ojos como platos. —¿A qué parte de Los Ángeles... esto, alteza?
vi_translation: The cigar fell from the driver's mouth. He looked at us in surprise: - To which location in Los Angeles, Madam?
tr_translation: The driver's cigarette fell from his mouth. He turned to us, eyes wide open, and asked, "Where would you like to go in Los Angeles, um... Your Majesty?"
es_translation: The man's cigar fell from his mouth. He looked at us again, this time with eyes wide open. —To which part of Los Angeles... this, your highness?

en: But the thing wasn’t attacking. It was nuzzling me. Heeling like a dog. Tentatively, I touched its dorsal fin. It bucked a little, as if inviting me to hold tighter. I grabbed the fin with both hands. It took off, pulling me along. The shark carried me down into the darkness. It deposited me at the edge of the ocean proper, where the sand bank dropped off into a huge chasm. It was like standing on the rim of the Grand Canyon at midnight, not being able to see much, but knowing the void was right there.
vi: Nhưng con vật không cắn, nó rúc mõm nép vào tôi như con chó nhà. Tôi rụt rè chạm vây lưng cá. Nó vui vẻ quẫy nhẹ, khuyến khích tôi nắm chặt hơn. Tôi giữ vây cá bằng cả hai tay. Nó bơi vút đi, kéo tôi theo. Nếu độc giả chưa bao giờ cưỡi cá mập, cũng đừng tự tìm cách thử... Tuy nhiên, phải công nhận cảm giác ấy tuyệt vời hơn bất kì buổi tập trượt băng nào. Cá mập đưa tôi vào vùng nước tối. Nó thả tôi ngay chỗ cát dưới đáy biển sụt xuống thành vực sâu thẳm. Tôi như đứng trên miệng hẻm núi vĩ đại Grand Canyon giữa đêm hôm khuya khoắt. Dù không nhìn rõ lắm nhưng vẫn biết có khoảng trống mênh mông, sâu hun hút dưới kia.
tr: Ama bana saldırmıyordu. Sadece burnuyla dürtüyordu. Bir köpek gibi, dizimin dibinden ayrılmıyordu. Korkarak köpekbalığının sırtındaki yüzgece dokundum. Biraz geri çekildi ama sanki onu daha da sıkı sıkıya tutmam için yapmıştı bunu. Yüzgeci iki elimle birden kavradım. Köpekbalığı beni de çekerek yola koyuldu. Beni karanlığın içine doğru götürüyordu. Sonra, tam kocaman bir uçurumun başladığı yerde, tam kenarda beni bıraktı. Gece yarısı Büyük Kanyon'un kenarında durmak gibi bir şeydi bu. Fazla bir şey göremiyordum ama boşluğun orada olduğunu da biliyordum.
es: Pero el bicho no atacaba. Tan sólo me olisqueaba. Me seguía como un perrito. Le toqué la aleta dorsal con cautela y el tiburón corcoveó un poco, como invitándome a agarrarme con fuerza. Me así a la aleta con las dos manos y el escualo salió disparado, arrastrándome con él. Me condujo hacia la oscuridad y me depositó en el límite mismo del océano, donde el banco de arena se despeñaba hacia un enorme abismo. Era como estar al borde del Gran Cañón a medianoche, sin ver demasiado pero consciente de que el vacío está justo ahí.
vi_translation: But the animal didn't bite; it nestled its snout against me like a house dog. I timidly touched the fish's dorsal fin. It happily wiggled lightly, encouraging me to hold on tighter. I held the fish's fin with both hands. It swam swiftly, pulling me along. If the reader has never ridden a shark, don't try to find a way to do it yourself... However, one must admit that the feeling is more wonderful than any ice skating practice. The shark took me into the dark waters. It dropped me right where the sand at the bottom of the sea sank into a deep abyss. I felt like I was standing on the edge of the Grand Canyon in the dead of night. Even though I couldn't see clearly, I still knew there was a vast, deep chasm below.
tr_translation: But it wasn't attacking me. It was just nudging me with its nose. Like a dog, it wouldn't leave my side. Fearfully, I touched the fin on the shark's back. It pulled back a little, but it seemed to do this so that I would hold on even tighter. I grasped the fin with both of my hands. The shark started to move, pulling me along. It was taking me into the darkness. Then, right at the edge where a huge abyss began, it left me. It was like standing at the edge of the Grand Canyon at midnight. I couldn't see much, but I knew the void was there.
es_translation: But the creature did not attack. It only sniffed me. It followed me like a puppy. I cautiously touched its dorsal fin and the shark bucked a little, as if inviting me to hold on tightly. I grabbed the fin with both hands and the shark shot off, dragging me with it. It led me into the darkness and deposited me at the very edge of the ocean, where the sandbank plunged into a huge abyss. It was like being on the edge of the Grand Canyon at midnight, not seeing much but aware that the void is right there.

en: My mind was racing. I knew I couldn’t take on this giant water-bed salesman alone. He would snap my neck before I ever got my sword out.
vi: Tôi tính toán thật nhanh. Mình tôi đấu với gã chủ tiệm khác nào trứng chọi đá. Hắn sẽ bẻ gãy cổ tôi trước khi tôi kịp rút kiếm.
tr: Başım dönüyordu. Bu dev gibi su yatağı satıcısını tek başıma yenemeyeceğimi biliyordum. Daha kılıcımı çekmeden boynumu kırardı.
es: La cabeza me iba a cien por hora. Sabía que no podía enfrentarme solo a aquel grandullón. Me rompería el cuello antes de que la espada se desplegase.
vi_translation: I calculated really quickly. Me alone fighting the shop owner is like an egg hitting a rock. He would break my neck before I could draw my sword.
tr_translation: My head was spinning. I knew I couldn't defeat this giant waterbed salesman on my own. He would break my neck before I could even draw my sword.
es_translation: My head was spinning a hundred miles an hour. I knew I couldn't face that big guy alone. He would break my neck before the sword could unfold.

en: I looked at the bulletin board behind Crusty’s sales desk. There was an advertisement for Hermes Delivery Service, and another for the All-New Compendium of L.A. Area Monsters-“The only Monstrous Yellow Pages you’ll ever need!” Under that, a bright orange flier for DOA Recording Studios, offering commissions for heroes’ souls. “We are always looking for new talent!” DOA’s address was right underneath with a map.
vi: Bảng thông báo sau bàn làm việc của Crusty có mẩu quảng cáo cho dịch vụ Phát Chuyển Nhanh Hermes và phần quảng cáo khác cho niên giám điện thoại mới của riêng giới yêu quái trong khu vực Los Angeles. “Niên giám những trang vàng của giới yêu quái đầy đủ thông tin nhất”. Dưới đó có tờ rơi màu vàng của phòng thu âm DOA hứa có thưởng cho ai giao nộp linh hồn con lai. “Chúng tôi luôn tìm kiếm tài năng trẻ!” Ngay dưới là địa chỉ DOA, kèm theo sơ đồ chỉ dẫn đường tới đó.
tr: Kabuklu'nun masasının orada duran panoya baktım. Hermes Nakliye Hizmetleri'nin ve Los Angeles Bölgesi Canavarlarıyla İlgili Özlü Bilgiler Kitabı'nm reklamları asılıydı. "Canavarlarla İlgili Bilgi Bulabileceğiniz Tek Sarı Sayfalar!" diyordu ilan. Onun altında da NSÖ Plakçılık'ın parlak turuncu broşürü duruyordu. Broşürde kahramanların ruhlarına karşılık komisyon verildiği yazıyordu. "Yeni yetenekler arıyoruz!" diyen broşürde, NSÖ'nün adresi bir haritayla birlikte verilmişti.
es: Miré en el tablón de anuncios detrás del mostrador de Crusty. Había un anuncio del servicio de entregas Hermes, y otro del Nuevo y completo compendio de la Zona Monstruo de Los Angeles: «¡Las únicas páginas amarillas monstruosas que necesita!» Debajo, un panfleto naranja de los estudios de grabación El Otro Barrio ofrecía incentivos por las almas de los héroes. «¡Buscamos nuevos talentos!» La dirección de EOB estaba indicada justo debajo con un mapa.
vi_translation: The bulletin board behind Crusty's desk had an advertisement for Hermes Express Delivery Service and another ad for the new phone directory exclusively for the supernatural community in the Los Angeles area. “The most comprehensive Yellow Pages for the supernatural community.” Below that was a yellow flyer from DOA Recording Studios promising a reward for anyone who turned in a demigod's soul. “We are always looking for young talent!” Just below was the DOA address, along with a map showing the way there.
tr_translation: I looked at the bulletin board standing by Kabuklu's desk. Advertisements for Hermes Shipping Services and the Concise Book of Information on the Monsters of the Los Angeles Area were posted. "The Only Yellow Pages Where You Can Find Information About Monsters!" said the ad. Below it was a bright orange brochure from NSÖ Records. The brochure stated that commissions were given in exchange for the souls of heroes. The brochure, which said "We are looking for new talents!", provided NSÖ's address along with a map.
es_translation: I looked at the bulletin board behind Crusty's counter. There was an ad for Hermes delivery service, and another for the New and Complete Compendium of the Monster Zone of Los Angeles: "The only monstrous yellow pages you need!" Below, an orange pamphlet from El Otro Barrio recording studios offered incentives for the souls of heroes. "We are looking for new talents!" The address of EOB was indicated just below with a map.

en: “Right. Now, no one get any ideas while I’m gone,” he announced to the waiting room. “And if anyone moves the dial off my easy-listening station again, I’ll make sure you’re here for another thousand years. Understand?”
vi: Hắn oang oang nói với cả phòng: Ai hỏi ta đi đâu, cấm đứa nào nói. Kẻ nào hé môi sẽ phải chờ thêm một ngàn năm nữa. Nhớ chưa?
tr: Lobidekilere dönerek "Tamam. Şimdi, ben yokken uslu durun bakalım." dedi. "Eğer hafif müzik istasyonunu değiştirmeye yeltenen olursa, bir bin yıl daha burada beklersiniz. Anlaşıldı mı?
es: —Vale. Escuchad: que a nadie se le ocurra pasarse de listo en mi ausencia —anunció a la sala de espera—. Y si alguno vuelve a tocar el dial de mi micrófono, me aseguraré de que paséis aquí mil años más. ¿Entendido?
vi_translation: He loudly said to the whole room: If anyone asks where I am going, no one is allowed to tell. Anyone who opens their mouth will have to wait another thousand years. Got it?
tr_translation: Turning to the lobsters, "Alright. Now, behave yourselves while I'm gone." he said. "If anyone dares to change the light music station, you'll wait here for another millennium. Understood?"
es_translation: —Okay. Listen: nobody better try to get clever in my absence —he announced to the waiting room—. And if anyone touches the dial on my microphone again, I'll make sure you spend a thousand more years here. Understood?

en: Mist curled off the filthy water. Above us, almost lost in the gloom, was a ceiling of stalactites. Ahead, the far shore glimmered with greenish light, the color of poison.
vi: Sương bảng lảng trên mặt sông dơ dáy. Cao tít phía trên là vòm hang đầy nhủ đá. Trước mặt, mơi bến bờ xa tắp tỏa ánh sáng xanh lục, màu của chất độc.
tr: Pis sudan sisler çıkıyordu. Tam üstümüzde sislerin arasında, sarkıtlardan oluşmuş bir tavan vardı. İleride gözüken kıyı, yeşilimsi, zehir renginde parıldıyordu.
es: La niebla se enroscó sobre la mugrienta agua. Por encima de nosotros, casi perdido en la penumbra, había un techo de estalactitas. Más adelante, la otra orilla brillaba con una luz verdosa, del color del veneno.
vi_translation: The mist drifts over the filthy river. High above is a cave ceiling full of stalactites. In front, the distant shore emits a green light, the color of poison.
tr_translation: Steam was rising from the water. Right above us, amidst the mist, there was a ceiling made of stalactites. The shore visible ahead was shimmering in a greenish, poisonous hue.
es_translation: The fog curled over the filthy water. Above us, almost lost in the dim light, there was a ceiling of stalactites. Further ahead, the other shore glowed with a greenish light, the color of poison.

en: We got closer to the gates. The howling was so loud now it shook the ground at my feet, but I still couldn’t figure out where it was coming from.
vi: Ba đứa tiến đến gần cửa. Dù tiến chó tru rung chuyển mặt đất nhưng tôi không biết nó phát ra từ đâu.
tr: Kapılara daha da yaklaşmışük. Uluma o kadar kötü bir hale gelmişti ki, bastığım zemin sallanıyordu. Buna rağmen, hâlâ sesin nereden geldiğini anlayamamıştım.
es: Nos acercamos a las puertas. Los alaridos se oían tan alto que hacían vibrar el suelo bajo mis pies, aunque seguía sin localizar el lugar del que procedían.
vi_translation: The three approached the door. Even though the howling of the dogs shook the ground, I couldn't tell where it was coming from.
tr_translation: We had gotten even closer to the doors. The howling had become so terrible that the ground I was standing on was shaking. Despite this, I still couldn't figure out where the sound was coming from.
es_translation: We approached the doors. The screams were so loud that they made the ground under my feet vibrate, although I still couldn't locate where they were coming from.

en: The dead walked right up to him-no fear at all. The ATTENDANT ON DUTY lines parted on either side of him. The EZ DEATH spirits walked right between his front paws and under his belly, which they could do without even crouching.
vi: Người chết không hề sợ hãi tiến thẳng đến chỗ nó. Dòng người ở hai hàng SẴN SÀNG PHỤC VỤ đi sát hai bên cạnh nó. Còn hàng EZ DEATH đi giữa hai chân vuốt dài nhọn, chui dưới bụng nó mà không cần khom người.
tr: Ölüler doğrudan ona doğru yürüyorlardı. Hiçbiri korkmuyordu. GÖREVLİ yazan kuyruktakiler, Kerberus'un yanına geçiyorlardı. KOLAY ÖLÜM ruhlarıysa Kerberus'un ön pençelerine ve karnının altına doğru yürüyor, bunu yaparken de eğilmelerine bile gerek kalmıyordu.
es: Los muertos caminaban directamente hacia él: no tenían miedo. Las filas en servicio se apartaban de él cada una a un lado. Los espíritus camino de muerte rápida pasaban justo entre sus patas delanteras y bajo su estómago, cosa que hacían sin necesidad de agacharse.
vi_translation: The dead person fearlessly advanced straight towards it. The line of people in the two rows READY TO SERVE walked closely on either side of it. Meanwhile, the EZ DEATH line moved between its long sharp claws, crawling under its belly without needing to bend down.
tr_translation: The dead were walking directly towards him. None of them were afraid. Those in the line marked OFFICIAL were passing by Cerberus. The souls of EASY DEATH were walking towards Cerberus's front paws and under his belly, without even needing to bend down while doing so.
es_translation: The dead walked directly towards him: they were not afraid. The rows on duty moved aside for him, each to one side. The spirits on the path of quick death passed right between his front legs and under his stomach, which they did without needing to duck.

en: I took the big stick out of my backpack-a bedpost I’d broken off Crusty’s Safari Deluxe floor model. I held it up, and tried to channel happy dog thoughts toward Cerberus-Alpo commercials, cute little puppies, fire hydrants. I tried to smile, like I wasn’t about to die.
vi: Tôi lấy cây gậy lớn trong ba lô. Thực ra đó là chân giường Safari Deluxe của Crusty. Vừa giơ gậy, tôi vừa cố tìm cách liên tưởng Cerberus với những y tưởng vui vẻ về chó: chẳng hạn những mẫu quảng cáo thức ăn cho chó, cún con xinh xắn hoặc vòi nước cứu hỏa. Gượng cười, tôi cố quên rằng mình sắp chết.
tr: Sırt çantamdan büyük sopayı çıkardım; bunu Kabuklu'nun dükkanındaki Lüks Safari modelinden koparmıştım. Sopayı havaya kaldırıp, Kerberus'a mutlu köpek düşünceleri iletmeye çalıştım. Sürekli olarak Alpo köpek maması reklamlarını, şirin, minik köpek yavrularını ve yangın söndürücüleri düşünüyordum. Sanki ölmek üzere değilmişim gibi gülümsemeye çalıştım.
es: Saqué un palo de mi mochila: el poste que había arrancado de la cama de Crusty modelo safari. Lo sostuve en alto, intentando canalizar hacia Cerbero pensamientos perrunos felices: anuncios de exquisiteces para perro, huesos de juguete, piensos apetitosos. Traté de sonreír, como si no estuviera a punto de morir.
vi_translation: I took the big stick out of my backpack. Actually, it was the leg of Crusty's Safari Deluxe bed. While raising the stick, I tried to associate Cerberus with cheerful ideas about dogs: for example, dog food commercials, cute puppies, or fire hydrants. Forcing a smile, I tried to forget that I was about to die.
tr_translation: I took the big stick out of my backpack; I had broken it off from the Luxury Safari model in Kabuklu's shop. Raising the stick in the air, I tried to send happy dog thoughts to Kerberus. I kept thinking about Alpo dog food commercials, cute little puppies, and fire extinguishers. I tried to smile as if I wasn't about to die.
es_translation: I took a stick out of my backpack: the post I had ripped off from Crusty's safari model bed. I held it up high, trying to channel happy dog thoughts towards Cerberus: commercials for dog treats, toy bones, appetizing kibble. I tried to smile, as if I weren't about to die.

en: The line coming from the right side of the judgment pavilion was much better. This one led down toward a small valley surrounded by walls-a gated community, which seemed to be the only happy part of the Underworld. Beyond the security gate were neighborhoods of beautiful houses from every time period in history, Roman villas and medieval castles and Victorian mansions. Silver and gold flowers bloomed on the lawns. The grass rippled in rainbow colors. I could hear laughter and smell barbecue cooking.
vi: Hàng người bên phải lều rạp đỡ khổ hơn nhiều. Người a dẫn họ xuống thung lũng nhỏ có tường bao quanh. Một cộng đồng biệt lập, nơi duy nhất có hạnh phúc dưới âm phủ. Bên kia cổng có lính gác là nhiều quần thể nhà đẹp, đại diện cho mọi lối kiến trúc từng có trong lịch sử: biệt thự kiểu La Mã, lâu đài kiểu trung cổ hoặc dinh thự kiểu Victoria. Hoa bằng vàng và bạc nở rộ trên bãi cỏ có màu của cầu vòng bảy sắc. Tiếng cười văng vẳng và mùi thịt nướng ngoài trời thơm nức.
tr: Karar çadırının sağ tarafından uzayıp giden kuyruk çok daha iyiydi. Bu kuyruk duvarlarla çevrili küçük bir vadiye çıkıyordu. Burada Yeraltı Dünyası'nın tek mutlu topluluğu var gibiydi. Güvenlik kapısının ötesinde, Roma villaları, Ortaçağ şatoları ve Viktorya dönemi malikaneleri gibi değişik tarihi dönemlerden kalma harikulade evlerle dolu mahalleler vardı. Bahçelerde gümüş ve altın rengi çiçekler açmıştı. Çimler gökkuşağı rengindeydi. Kahkahalar duyuluyor, barbekü kokuları geliyordu.
es: La fila que llegaba del lado derecho del pabellón de los juicios era mucho mejor. Esta conducía pendiente abajo hacia un pequeño valle rodeado de murallas: una zona residencial que parecía el único lugar feliz del inframundo. Más allá de la puerta de seguridad había vecindarios de casas preciosas de todas las épocas, desde villas romanas a castillos medievales o mansiones victorianas. Flores de plata y oro lucían en los jardines. La hierba ondeaba con los colores del arco iris. Oí risas y olor a barbacoa.
vi_translation: The people on the right side of the tent had it much easier. Person A led them down to a small valley surrounded by walls. An isolated community, the only place with happiness in the underworld. Beyond the gate with guards were many beautiful houses, representing every architectural style ever in history: Roman-style villas, medieval castles, or Victorian mansions. Golden and silver flowers bloomed on the lawns with the colors of a rainbow. Laughter echoed and the smell of outdoor grilled meat was fragrant.
tr_translation: The line extending from the right side of the decision tent was much better. This line led to a small valley surrounded by walls. Here, it seemed like the only happy community of the Underworld existed. Beyond the security gate, there were neighborhoods filled with marvelous houses from various historical periods, such as Roman villas, Medieval castles, and Victorian mansions. Silver and gold-colored flowers had bloomed in the gardens. The lawns were rainbow-colored. Laughter could be heard, and the smell of barbecues was in the air.
es_translation: The line that came from the right side of the judgment pavilion was much better. It led downhill to a small valley surrounded by walls: a residential area that seemed like the only happy place in the underworld. Beyond the security gate, there were neighborhoods with beautiful houses from all eras, from Roman villas to medieval castles or Victorian mansions. Silver and gold flowers shone in the gardens. The grass waved with the colors of the rainbow. I heard laughter and smelled barbecue.

en: The tunnel got darker and colder. The hairs on my arms bristled. It smelled evil down here. It made me think of things I shouldn’t even know about-blood spilled on an ancient stone altar, the foul breath of a murderer.
vi: Đường hầm ngày càng tối và lạnh hơn. Tôi sởn gai ốc. Dưới này có mùi của ma quỷ. Nó gợi nhớ đến những thứ tôi không nên nghĩ tới: máu lênh láng trên mặt bàn thờ đá thời xa xưa và mùi hơi thở hôi thối của kẻ sát nhân.
tr: Tünel gitgide daha da karanlık ve soğuk oldu. Kollarımdaki tüyler ürperiyordu. Burada çok kötü bir hava vardı. Hayatımda daha önce görmediğim birtakım imgeler gözümün önüne geliyordu: eski bir sunağa akıtılmış kanlar, bir katilin leş gibi kokan nefesi...
es: El túnel se volvió aún más oscuro y frío. Se me erizó el vello de los brazos y percibí una horrible fetidez. Me hizo pensar en cosas que ni siquiera había experimentado nunca: sangre derramada en un antiguo altar de piedra, el aliento repulsivo de un asesino.
vi_translation: The tunnel was getting darker and colder. I got goosebumps. Down here, it smelled of evil spirits. It reminded me of things I shouldn't think about: blood spilling over an ancient stone altar and the foul breath of a murderer.
tr_translation: The tunnel became darker and colder. The hairs on my arms were standing up. There was a very bad atmosphere here. Images I had never seen before in my life were coming to my mind: blood spilled on an old altar, the stinking breath of a murderer...
es_translation: The tunnel became even darker and colder. The hair on my arms stood on end, and I perceived a horrible stench. It made me think of things I had never even experienced: blood spilled on an ancient stone altar, the repulsive breath of a murderer.

en: He was yelling, clawing at the ground, but the winged shoes kept dragging him toward the pit, and it didn’t look like we could possibly get to him in time.
vi: Grover la lối, cào mặt đất nhưng đôi giày nhất định lôi nó xuống vực. Chúng tôi tuyệt vọng vì muốn cứu cũng không kịp nữa.
tr: Kıvırcık çığlık atıyor, yerlere tutunmaya çalışıyor ama ayakkabıları onu dosdoğru uçuruma doğru götürüyordu. Ona zamanında yetişmemiz imkansız gibi gözüküyordu.
es: Gritaba y manoteaba el suelo, pero las zapatillas aladas seguían arrastrándolo hacia el foso, y no parecía que pudiéramos llegar a tiempo.
vi_translation: Grover screamed and clawed at the ground, but the shoes kept dragging him down the chasm. We were desperate because it was too late to save him.
tr_translation: Curly is screaming, trying to hold onto the ground, but his shoes were taking him straight towards the cliff. It seemed impossible for us to reach him in time.
es_translation: He was shouting and flailing at the ground, but the winged shoes kept dragging him towards the pit, and it didn't seem like we could get there in time.

en: Up close, I saw that the engravings on the gates were scenes of death. Some were from modern times-an atomic bomb exploding over a city, a trench filled with gas mask-wearing soldiers, a line of African famine victims waiting with empty bowls-but all of them looked as if they’d been etched into the bronze thousands of years ago. I wondered if I was looking at prophecies that had come true.
vi: Đến gần hơn, tôi nhận thấy trên cổng khắc chạm toàn cảnh chết chóc. Có cảnh thời hiện đại, như bom nguyên tử thổi bay cả thành phố, sông ngòi đầy xác lính đeo mặt nạ chống độc, đoàn người Phi châu sắp chết đói cầm tô xếp hàng chờ phát chẩn… Mọi cảnh minh họa đều cổ kính, nhất định được khắc lên đó cả ngàn năm rồi. Chúng là lời tiên tri của nhiều ngàn năm trước giờ trở thành hiện thực.
tr: Yakından bakınca kapıların üzerindeki oymaların çeşitli ölüm sahnelerini yansıttığını gördüm. Bazıları günümüzdendi; mesela, bir şehrin üzerinde patlayan bir atom bombasını, gaz maskesi takmış askerleri, ellerinde bomboş yemek kaplarıyla sırada bekleyen aç Afrikalıları gösterenoymalar vardı. Ama hepsi de bu bronz kapılara sanki asırlar önce kazınmış gibiydi. Bunların gerçekleşen kehanetler olup olmadıklarını merak ettim bir an.
es: Cuando estuve más cerca, aprecié que los grabados de dichas puertas reproducían escenas de muerte. Algunas eran de tiempos modernos —una bomba atómica explotando encima de una ciudad, una trinchera llena de soldados con máscaras antigás, una fila de víctimas de hambrunas africanas, esperando con cuencos vacíos en la mano—, pero todas parecían labradas en bronce hacía miles de años. Me pregunté si eran profecías hechas realidad.
vi_translation: Getting closer, I noticed the gate was carved with scenes of death. There were scenes of modern times, like an atomic bomb blowing up an entire city, rivers filled with the bodies of soldiers wearing gas masks, lines of starving African people holding bowls, waiting for food distribution... All the illustrations were ancient, definitely carved there thousands of years ago. They were prophecies from many thousands of years ago that have now become reality.
tr_translation: When I looked closely, I saw that the carvings on the doors depicted various scenes of death. Some were from our time; for example, there were carvings showing an atomic bomb exploding over a city, soldiers wearing gas masks, and starving Africans waiting in line with empty food containers in their hands. But they all seemed to have been etched onto these bronze doors centuries ago. I wondered for a moment if these were prophecies that had come true.
es_translation: When I got closer, I noticed that the engravings on those gates depicted scenes of death. Some were from modern times —an atomic bomb exploding over a city, a trench full of soldiers wearing gas masks, a line of famine victims in Africa, waiting with empty bowls in hand—, but all seemed to have been carved in bronze thousands of years ago. I wondered if they were prophecies come true.

en: Two U.S. Marine skeletons guarded the doors. They grinned down at us, rocket-propelled grenade launchers held across their chests.
vi: Hai bộ xương mặc đồ lính thủy đánh bộ Mỹ canh cửa này. Thấy tôi họ nhăn nhở cười, tay vẫn ghì súng phóng lựu đạn trước ngực.
tr: Kapıların önünde iki ABD'li denizci iskeleti bekliyordu. Bize bakıp sırıttılar. Göğüslerine roketle fırlatılan el bombaları asmışlardı.
es: Dos esqueletos con uniforme de marine custodiaban las puertas. Nos sonrieron. Tenían lanzagranadas automáticos cruzados sobre el pecho.
vi_translation: Two skeletons dressed in U.S. Marine uniforms guard this door. Seeing me, they grinned broadly, their hands still gripping grenade launchers against their chests.
tr_translation: In front of the doors, two skeletons of American sailors were waiting. They looked at us and grinned. They had grenades launched by rockets hanging on their chests.
es_translation: Two skeletons in marine uniforms guarded the doors. They smiled at us. They had automatic grenade launchers crossed over their chests.

en: The throne room shook with a tremor so strong, they probably felt it upstairs in Los Angeles. Debris fell from the cavern ceiling. Doors burst open all along the walls, and skeletal warriors marched in, hundreds of them, from every time period and nation in Western civilization. They lined the perimeter of the room, blocking the exits.
vi: Căn phòng rung chuyển như thể sắp làm cả Los Angeles phía trên đổ sụp. Gạch đá từ trần hang rơi như mưa. Mọi cửa chính phụ ở bốn bức tường bật mở. Hàng trăm bộ xương lính canh mặc quân phục của mọi quốc gia thuộc nền văn minh phương tây rầm rập bước vào. Họ đứng thành hàng quây quanh phòng, chắn mọi lối ra.
tr: Taht odası öyle şiddetle sallandı ki, eminim Los Angeles bile sarsılmıştı. Mağaranın tavanından bir şeyler döküldü. Duvarlardaki kapıların hepsi açıldı ve bütün tarihi zamanlardan ve Batı medeniyetinden yüzlerce iskelet savaşçı içeri girdi. Odanın tam ortasında sıralanarak bütün çıkışları kapattılar.
es: El salón del trono se sacudió con un temblor tan fuerte que probablemente lo notaron en Los Angeles. Cayeron escombros del techo de la caverna. Las puertas se abrieron de golpe en todos los muros, y los guerreros esqueléticos entraron, docenas de ellos, de todas las épocas y naciones de la civilización occidental. Formaron en el perímetro de la sala, bloqueando las salidas.
vi_translation: The room shook as if it was about to bring down all of Los Angeles above. Bricks and stones fell from the cave ceiling like rain. All the main and side doors on the four walls burst open. Hundreds of skeleton guards in uniforms of every nation from Western civilization marched in. They stood in rows surrounding the room, blocking all exits.
tr_translation: The throne room shook so violently that I'm sure even Los Angeles felt it. Something fell from the ceiling of the cave. All the doors in the walls opened, and hundreds of skeletal warriors from all historical periods and Western civilization entered. They lined up in the middle of the room, blocking all the exits.
es_translation: The throne room shook with a tremor so strong that it was probably felt in Los Angeles. Debris fell from the cavern's ceiling. The doors burst open on all the walls, and skeletal warriors entered, dozens of them, from all eras and nations of Western civilization. They formed a perimeter around the room, blocking the exits.

en: From his pocket he took out a ski cap-the kind bank robbers wear-and placed it between the handlebars of his bike. Immediately, the cap transformed into an elaborate bronze war helmet.
vi: Ông ta lấy mũ lưỡi trai trong túi móc lên tay ga của xe mô tô. đây là loại mũ trùm kín mặt, chỉ chừa hai mắt bọn cướp ngân hàng thường đội. Nó lập tức biến thành mũ đồng trang trí cầu kỳ của lính Hy Lạp cổ.
tr: Cebinden, aynı soyguncuların giydiği gibi bir kasket çıkardı ve bunu motosikletinin tutacaklarının arasına koydu. Kasket, anında gösterişli, bronz bir savaş miğferine dönüştü.
es: —Se sacó del bolsillo un pasamontañas, del tipo que usan los atracadores de bancos, y lo colocó en medio del manillar de su moto, donde se transformó en un elaborado casco guerrero de bronce.
vi_translation: He took a baseball cap from his pocket and hooked it onto the throttle of the motorcycle. This type of cap covered the entire face, leaving only the eyes exposed, similar to what bank robbers often wore. It immediately transformed into an elaborately decorated helmet of ancient Greek soldiers.
tr_translation: He took a cap out of his pocket, just like the ones the robbers wore, and placed it between the handles of his motorcycle. The cap instantly transformed into a flashy, bronze war helmet.
es_translation: —He took a balaclava out of his pocket, the kind bank robbers use, and placed it in the middle of his motorcycle's handlebar, where it transformed into an elaborate bronze warrior helmet.

en: “That’s cool, dead boy,” he said. “Classic it is.” The baseball bat changed into a huge, two-handed sword. The hilt was a large silver skull with a ruby in its mouth.
vi: - Hay lắm. Vậy cổ điển nhé. Gậy bóng chày biến thành gươm hai lưỡi cỡ lớn. Chuôi kiếm bạc hình đầu lâu ngậm hồng ngọc lấp lánh.
tr: "Peki o zaman, ölü çocuk," dedi. "Klasik olsun." Beyzbol sopası, kocaman, ancak iki elle tutulabilen bir kılıca dönüştü. Kılıcın kabzası, ağzında bir yakut tutan kocaman bir kurukafaydı.
es: —Para estar muerto tienes mucha gracia —contestó—. Probemos con el clásico. Entonces el bate se convirtió en una enorme espada cuya empuñadura era un cráneo de plata con un rubí en la boca.
vi_translation: - Very good. So, classical then. The baseball bat transformed into a large double-edged sword. The silver sword hilt was shaped like a skull holding a sparkling ruby.
tr_translation: "Well then, dead child," he said. "Let it be classic." The baseball bat turned into a huge sword that could only be held with two hands. The hilt of the sword was a large skull holding a ruby in its mouth.
es_translation: —For being dead, you have a lot of charm —he replied—. Let's try with the classic. Then the bat turned into a huge sword with a silver skull hilt and a ruby in its mouth.

en: I couldn’t look away from Ares for fear he’d slice me in half, but out of the corner of my eye I saw red lights flashing on the shoreline boulevard. Car doors were slamming.
vi: Nếu ngoái đầu nhìn, chắc chắn Ares xé đôi người tôi ngay. Tôi liếc ngang thấy ngoài lộ đèn đỏ loang loáng. Có tiếng sập cửa xe rầm rầm.
tr: Derken, gözlerimin ucuyla kıyıya yakın caddede kırmızı ışıkların yanıp söndüğünü gördüm. Araba kapıları çarpıyordu.
es: No dejé de mirar a Ares por miedo a que me partiera en dos, pero con el rabillo del ojo vi luces rojas parpadear en el paseo marítimo. Se oyeron frenazos y portezuelas de coche.
